summary: Hi my dear friend.its preset for chargen.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Please read the description and requirements before downloading.[/b]
[/color][color=#93c47d][size=5][b][b]

Description[/b][/b][/size][/color]:This is a CharGen preset.
[color=#93c47d][size=5]
[/size][/color][color=#93c47d][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color] [b]for CharGen Preset:[/b]
SG Female Textures Renewal and eyebrows-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/? (and wet body texture)
SG hair pack (Google it)
ApachiiSkyHair-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
UNPB Body-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/? (
racemenu-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/
CharGen Extension-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/
Runic Eyes http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43899/
SKSE google it!
Battle Hardened Warpaints http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/
The Neith Team Warpaints Set http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?
ENB : Somber 3 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?
Racemenu precache killer http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?


[color=#6aa84f][size=5][b]Used for Screenshots[/b] [/size][/color]:
Somber 3 enb.
tropic island
Nortgirl armor.
black rose bots and gloves.
ring and necklare  Ultimate Assortment
[color=#93c47d][size=5][b][size=2][color=#ffffff]aether suit (google it) [/color][/size]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=2]halo and pinup poser
and FNIS anims[/size][/color]
Installation[/b][/size][/color] :
1.Download preset file.
2. put preset file (47.slot) into u skyrim folder ( skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\Chargen\presets )
3. launch skyrim and load any working safe game.
4.type into console showracemenu
5.choice race redguard,switch to female and load preset from slot 47.


[color=#6aa84f][b][size=5]Enjoy![/size][/b][/color]
author: Tolos
